Text: This is ripped from a worn video tape, with bad video and worse audio. Many thanks for sharing it, but I wouldn't bother downloading it if I weren't a diehard fan of the band...

Could someone reseed this! PLEASE!!!!

Thanks!
Thanks for sharing! Great stuff if you're a JD fan.
My original tape, bought new when it first came out was very low quality, blurry and dark.  Don't blame the uploader for that, blame the Factory.

I agree, I bought the VHS years ago and watched it once and never again since. Although the set list is OK, the quality of the video and audio is truly awful especially for an official release. Apparently Tony Wilson had just got himself a home video cam a few days before and couldn't resist trying it out at the gig!

Sorry, I forgot to say, don't blame the U/Per, this is probably as good as this video gets. It's worth the download for fans simply for nostalgia.

Thanks, bhu73!
The audio quality was not good in the original recording. It only surfaced because of lack of actual footage of the band. Certainly, it was never meant to be released as a live recording.
This Seems Great But could someone Please Seed? Im Desperate. Thanks!
